context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. Hybrid cloud storage leader. Competing with Pure, Dell, cloud.

competitors.name: Dell Technologies
competitors.notes: Top traditional competitor in storage infrastructure and data management

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
competitors.notes: Major storage and hybrid cloud infrastructure competitor

competitors.notes: All-flash storage leader competing in AI workload optimization

competitors.notes: Enterprise storage and data infrastructure solutions
